pages.text: Immersive Engineering is a tech mod built around the concept of retrofuturistic generation and transfer of energy.$(br2)Generate power from waterwheels or create diesel from plants! Craft yourself a revolver, a flamethrower, or even a railgun!$(br2)Automate EVERYTHING!
The Engineer's Manual will serve as your guide for setting up all the new machines and functions this mod has to offer.$(br2)It can be crafted with a book and a lever.
